summary: This document provides details about Jeffrey Epstein's offender status, including his address, sentencing information, and conditions of probation. It outlines his charges related to prostitution and includes information about his work release directions.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein was sentenced to 12 months plus 6 months consecutive probation starting on October 10, 2008.
The case number for Epstein's prostitution charges is 2006CF009454AXX/2008CF009381AXX.

Judge Puciilo is the judge who sentenced Epstein.
